description:
The other members of the Shuffle Alliance all escape the Guyana Highlands. Domon stays back to defeat Master Asia and the Devil Gundam.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Destined Battle! Domon vs. Dark Gundam
Le combat fatidique ! Domon contre le Devil Gundam
Schicksalskampf! Domon gegen den Devil Gundam
Shukumei no Tatakai! Domon Tai Devil Gundam
宿命の闘い! ドモン対デビルガンダム
